Name: Irfan Raza
AboutMe:
To describe in a nutshell

My hobbies include talking with dumb computers in their languages to make them work as per my needs. I know the direction to deep dive to get relevant stuffs from the ocean of internet. Passionate about the famous Green Robot mobile platform and always try to apply best practices to make that robot mine. The word cloud really excites me, so from last year only I got to know how to reach to the cloud to explore endless possibilities. My target for this year is to learn and play with massive volume of structured and unstructured data so that by the end of the year I would be able make analysis based on dataâ€‹..... I look forward for the breathtaking experience, Amazing ..Wouldn't it?

Apart from my technical skills I am very good on identifying the business problems and and can suggest the approach to address that problem using technology. Working with TCS and few startups has given me confidence about the planning of the product development lifecycle. My working experience as freelancer has given me exposure to translate business requirements into technical requirement. Also being a team leader I can fill the gap between developers who are working in different technology in the same product. I can guide them to build the product with industry standards and if they get stuck on code then I don't mind folding my sleeve up to work with them whole night.
